Others: The Houston Rockets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies with a score of 119-115.
The win over the Grizzlies improves the Rockets' record to 25-12.
The Rockets are now in a better position for the No. 2 seed in the Western Conference as the Grizzlies are 24-14.
The Rockets have won 2 out of 2 games against the Grizzlies this season.
The Rockets are currently behind the Oklahoma City Thunder in the season series by just one game (2-1).
